title: Орел и решка. Новая жизнь
overview: "Eagle and Tails" is starting a "New Life"!Now the hosts don't just look into the most interesting, beautiful and amazing corners of the planet. They try on cities and countries for themselves and try to understand - is it possible to stay here?The rules are unchanged: one host has a budget of 100 dollars, the other conquers new places with an unlimited card. "Eagle and Tails. New Life" is a challenge to modern realities, when you don't know where you will end up tomorrow.
